summary: The self-driving car is driving on a road at night. From 0.0s to 8.0s, a motorcycle is seen driving in the same direction as the self-driving car. From 9.0s to 14.1s, the self-driving car approaches a traffic light. There is construction on the right side of the road.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight on a road at night. The driver is maintaining a consistent speed, likely due to the presence of another vehicle (motorcycle) ahead and the anticipation of approaching a traffic light. The driver is also navigating around construction on the right side of the road.
